name: federated-npm
description: Use Unpkg or esm.sh to retrieve all shared modules needed. Allowing you to access all of npm on demand

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm build && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.legacy:e2e:ci: pnpm legacy:build && npx playwright install --with-deps && npx playwright test --reporter=list
